mapper.insert: INSERT INTO ticket (start_station, stop_station, departure_time, price,ticket_num, type, route_id) VALUES (#{startStation}, #{stopStation}, #{departureTime}, #{price}, #{ticketNum}, #{type}, #{routeId})
mapper.update: UPDATE ticket SET start_station=#{startStation}, stop_station=#{stopStation}, departure_time=#{departureTime}, price=#{price}, ticket_num=#{ticketNum}, type=#{type}, route_id=#{routeId} WHERE id=#{id}
mapper.select: SELECT id, start_station, stop_station, departure_time, price, ticket_num, type, route_id FROM ticket

SELECT id, start_station, stop_station, departure_time, price, ticket_num, type, route_id FROM ticket
AND start_station LIKE CONCAT('%',#{startStation},'%')
AND stop_station LIKE CONCAT('%',#{stopStation},'%')
LIMIT #{startIndex}, #{pageSize}
SELECT id, start_station, stop_station, departure_time, price, ticket_num,type, route_id FROM ticket WHERE id=#{id}
